sentence: The image depicts a small, clear glass shelf mounted on a textured, off-white wall.
sentence_cn: 图像描绘了一个小型透明玻璃架子，安装在带有纹理的灰白色墙壁上。

sentence: On the left side of the shelf, there is a bottle labeled "Yankee Candle" with "Sage & Citrus" written on it, indicating a scented product.
sentence_cn: 在架子的左侧，有一个瓶子，上面贴有“Yankee Candle”的标签，上面写着“Sage & Citrus”，表明这是一种有香味的产品。

sentence: Next to the bottle are two fragrance sachets, also labeled "Yankee Candle," with the "Sage & Citrus" scent.
sentence_cn: 瓶子旁边是两个香薰袋，也标有“Yankee Candle”，带有“鼠尾草和柑橘”香味。

sentence: The design on the sachets features an image of citrus fruit and sage leaves.
In the center of the shelf, there is a small, round, brown ceramic holder, possibly for a tealight candle, though it appears empty.
sentence_cn: 架子的中央有一个小而圆的棕色陶瓷支架，可能用来放置茶蜡烛，不过支架里面是空的。

sentence: On the right end of the shelf, there is a decorative, amber-colored glass vase with a wide opening and a textured, iridescent body, adding a touch of elegance to the arrangement.
sentence_cn: 架子的右端有一个装饰性的琥珀色玻璃花瓶，开口较大，瓶身纹理鲜明，闪闪发亮，给整个布置增添了一丝优雅。

sentence: The overall display creates a cozy, aromatic ambiance, suggestive of home fragrance and decoration.
sentence_cn: 整体展示营造出一种舒适、芳香的氛围，让人联想到家居的香味和装饰。
